chapter.title: About JBoss Messaging 2.0.0
chapter.para: JBoss Messaging is the enterprise messaging system from JBoss.

JBoss Messaging is the default JMS provider in the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform, and JBoss Service Integration Platform. It will also be the default JMS provider in JBoss Application Server 5, and is the default JMS provider for JBoss ESB.
JBoss Messaging is an integral part of Red Hat's strategy for messaging.
The procedure of installing and configuring JBoss Messaging is detailed in this guide, along with a set of runnable examples.
Please send your suggestions or comments to the JBoss Messaging user forum.
